description: Ni is an antagonist from http://anidb.net/a6503 [Naruto Shippuuden 3: Inheritors of the Will of Fire]. She is a kunoichi and one of http://anidb.net/ch16975 [Hiruko]`s three followers, along with http://anidb.net/ch17146 [Ichi] and http://anidb.net/ch17142 [San].She has two purple stripes on her left cheek, a bodysuit that revealed much, and long brown hair curled into a very intricate spiral. She has a mark on her back that is the same as the one in Hiruko`s left palm.
name: Ni
